de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan

Class ERiCNeighborPredicate<V extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan.ERiCNeighborPredicate<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of NumberVector handled by this Algorithm
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    NeighborPredicate

    @Reference(authors="E. Achtert, C. B\u00f6hm, H.-P. Kriegel, P. Kr\u00f6ger, and A. Zimek",
           title="On Exploring Complex Relationships of Correlation Clusters",
           booktitle="Proc. 19th International Conference on Scientific and Statistical Database Management (SSDBM 2007), Banff, Canada, 2007",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/SSDBM.2007.21")
public class ERiCNeighborPredicate<V extends NumberVector>
extends Object
implements NeighborPredicate
    ERiC neighborhood predicate. Reference:

    E. Achtert, C. Böhm, H.-P. Kriegel, P. Kröger, and A. Zimek:
    On Exploring Complex Relationships of Correlation Clusters.
    In Proc. 19th International Conference on Scientific and Statistical Database Management (SSDBM 2007), Banff, Canada, 2007.

    TODO: improve performance by allowing index support for finding neighbors and/or exploiting the data partitioning better.
    Author:
    Elke Achtert, Erich Schubert
